post.contents:
June 28

  • Fixed: Mobile: Some bugs editing in Agenda

June 27

  • Fixed: A potential crash when loading an existing file into a fresh instance
  • Fixed: Mobile: + button in Agenda

June 25

  • Fixed: Todoist import with project hierarchy
  • Fixed: Issues with highlighting by mouse being incorrect when starting with a double click
  • Fixed: Offline support on iOS
  • Select by word if selection started as a double click
  • Updated Show Completed filter on mobile to have Show and Only options

June 24

  • Version 1.1.1 of desktop apps:
    • Fixed: Memory leak and runaway process issues on Windows
    • Fixed: Linux installer sometimes did not work
    • Save and restore maximized and fullscreen state
  • Fixed: Scrolling while dragging on iOS
  • Fixed: Copy of collapsed items losing indentation
  • Fixed: HTML elements * characters for bolding were appearing in breadcrumbs
  • Fixed: Don’t include * characters in tags
  • Fixed: HTML showing in tags
  • Fixed: Some editing errors around formatting characters
  • The message in empty panes has information about how many items are hidden by search and filters

June 23

  • Released new version of iOS app with the new filters, rich text notes and email composing, faster load and sync, and many bugx fixed
  • OPML import supports note attribute named “Notes”
  • Fixed: Email labelling menu was sometimes appending extra text to the label
  • Fixed: Checkboxes in Email pane are vertically centered
  • Fixed: Copy was losing hierarchy for children of the first selected item
  • Fixed: Item insert menu was not inserting items into the right place

June 22

  • Fixed: Mobile: Hiding the top bar when switching to landscape while editing was sometimes not working
  • Fixed: Tag autocomplete runs on tags in the whole File, not just visible in the pane
  • Fixed: Closing the introduction video was sometimes not working
  • Improved performance while typing in items with tags

June 21

  • Images in Google Drive can now be shown inline. Right click on a Drive file (that links to an image) and select “Show as image” to show it inline.
  • Dropping on a tag or contact block only replaces tag/contact if dropped from a corresponding block
  • Renamed “Delete Event” in item menu to “Remove from Google Calendar”

June 20

  • Allow drag/dropping of Drive Folders
  • Fixed: autocomplete sometimes overwriting emails/files
  • Fixed: settings not being scrollable on small screens
  • Fixed: Errors when creating items in Calendar view synced to Google Calendar
  • Fixed: The “Delete” menu option on calendar items also deletes from Google Calendar

June 17

  • Fixed: Android: Drag drop was sometimes not working right
  • Fixed: Android: Completed filter was named incorrectly
  • Fixed: Android: Loading and saving of collapsed state
  • Fixed: Android: Dragging emails to drop bucket
  • Fixed: Android: Items added from widget were not showing

June 16

  • Released new version of Android app with the new filters, rich text notes and email composing, faster load and sync, and many bugx fixed
  • iOS app is in review

June 14

  • Fixed: Search in Drive pane wasn’t working right
  • Fixed: Search for emails and files in other panes too
  • Fixed: Search highlighting was sometimes buggy when searching for multiple small words
  • Fixed: Links were sometimes parsing at the wrong position in the text
  • Insert link menu is better at removing links: a button to remove the link, and can clear link or text

June 13

  • Fixed: Overview was not collapsible in flat search
  • Fixed: Old style dates like @now could make typing slow
  • Improved styling of agenda: reduced some padding, right aligned day number
  • Insert link edits existing links better
  • Select full items when multiple items are selected
  • Added a - button to the formatting toolbar to collapse it to a small … button. There’s also a new setting in General settings to disable it completely.

June 6

  • Fixed: Sometimes notes were not displaying previews
  • Fixed: Shift + Enter closes note editor

June 3

  • Fixed: Double insert of links from insert link menu
  • Fixed: Prefix showing on the last line of items in add item menu
  • Fixed: Crash pasting images
  • Fixed: Background of note field in add item menu in dark theme matches other fields
  • Fixed: Arrow keys in outline were broken by update earlier today

June 1

  • Fixed: Crash dragging a file from desktop onto a pane

May 31

  • Fixed: Pane rendering was wonky when manually resized and then opening an email preview
  • Fixed: Alt or Option clicking a date removes the whole date + duration, and works correctly when it spans multiple lines
  • Fixed: Items with durations in the agenda are draggable

May 26

  • Fixed: Recursive collapse is instant now
  • Fixed: Delete selected toast hides after the normal 5 seconds
  • Enter on an empty prefixed item does not remove the prefix
  • Add an icon next to file name in sidebar
  • Enter on an empty prefixed item does remove the prefix (as it did previously)

May 25

Launch of new version
